about_the_game:
In Race Race Racer, feel your passion for speed with High-Speed Racing Retro Cars. Put your pedal to the metal and race your car through stunningly 80's style Classic Arcade car racing game!

Feel the rush as you tear down the track at breakneck speeds in a thrilling car race to the finish.

4 Game Play Modes:

* Rally Racing: Race 15+ Intelligent AI Opponents and hit the finish line.

* Knock Out Race: Keep Eliminating the last racer in circuit until you are the only one left.

* Cops Pursuit: Chase and Take down High-Speed Criminals.

* Smash Crash Mode - Dash and Blow Off Cars on Highway.

* More Game-play Modes Coming Soon.....

Features:

> Race against a field of 15+ rival drivers, each with unique personalities.

> 100+ Level with top notch graphics and special effects. More Coming Soon..

> 8 Unlock-able High Speed Retro Racing Cars.

developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops.
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Race Race Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
reviews:
““A simple race on retro cars. Bright and eye-catching graphics, several game modes and many levels! Stay alone with the road and speed!””
10 – OutStanding Reviews
short_description: Feel the rush as you tear down the track at breakneck speeds in a thrilling car race to the finish.
